resources.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `Sites` ( `_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `HabitatNo` TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE, `OldSiteNo` TEXT, `VisitNo` REAL NOT NULL, `When` REAL NOT NULL, `Base_Town` TEXT, `Km` REAL, `Habitat` TEXT, `Nearest` TEXT, `Distance` REAL, `Bearing` TEXT, `Secondary Admin` TEXT, `Primary Admin` TEXT, `Latitude` REAL, `Longitude` REAL, `Altitude` INTEGER, `Prologue` TEXT, `Epilogue` TEXT);
